remediation: Normalize custodian codes. Prefer NBIM’s long-form name when available.

pattern: Adjust the holding quantity to 12000, update the tax to 13020, and revise the net amount settlement to 24180.
remediation: Implement the adjustments as per the custodian's values.

type: Adjustments required for tax rate and amounts
pattern: Adjust tax rate, change quote amount and verify currency
remediation: Adjust the tax rate in NBIM to match Custody's 20%. Change the NET_AMOUNT_QUOTATION in NBIM to 7220000. Verify and prefer the Custody's settlement currency. Escalate if there are discrepancies in reporting.

pattern: holding quantity and amounts differ from Custody's records
remediation: Adjust holding quantity to 12000, update GROSS_AMOUNT_QUOTATION to 37200, NET_AMOUNT_QUOTATION to 24180, and TAX to 13020.
Adjust the net amount and tax amount to align with the correct figures, and update the tax rate to 20% as per the Custody's report.

pattern: Adjust holding quantity, update gross amount quotation, revise net amount quotation, recalculate tax amount
remediation: Adjust holding quantity to 12000, update gross amount quotation to 37200, and revise net amount quotation to 24180.

pattern: Adjust the net amount quotation to 7,220,000, recalculate NBIM's tax amount using the custodian's tax rate of 20%.
remediation: Set the tax amount to the recalculated value.

pattern: Adjust the tax rate from 25% to 20%.
remediation: Update the NET_AMOUNT_QUOTATION to 7,220,000 and adjust the TAX to reflect the new net amount accordingly.

pattern: Adjust holding quantity and financial amounts as per the suggestion.
remediation: Adjust holding quantity to 12000, GROSS_AMOUNT_QUOTATION to 37200, NET_AMOUNT_QUOTATION to 24180, and TAX to 13020. Prefer Custody’s settlement currency and escalate if NBIM reports a different one.

type: Holding Quantity and Net Amount Discrepancy Adjustment
